original_title: A/L Tamil medium paper marking commences: PMD
original_body_lines: The Examinations Department said the preliminary marking of the A/L Tamil medium answer scripts has commenced today (21).
Accordingly, the process of confirming the control answer script marking procedure regarding several subjects is currently underway, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said in a statement.

Commissioner General of Examinations H.J.M.C. Amith Jayasundara mentioned that the paper marking activities have begun in relation to the subjects of Hinduism, Christianity, Hindu Civilization, Bharatha Dancing, Oriental Music, Carnatic Music, Western Music, Art, Drama & Theatre and Hindi.
The work will be done at the answer script marking centers in the cities of Jaffna, Colombo, Batticaloa, Gampaha, Kalutara and Kurunegala, the Commissioner General of Examinations added.

He further stated that sufficient applications have been received to commence the work of marking the answer scripts in relation to other subjects including Sinhala and English medium and they are currently discussing with the relevant parties about the implementation of the work.
